text: Gen tte yaru ga i. `Keiten'notami yo, watashi-tachi to anata gata to no ma no kyotsu no kotoba (no shita) ni ki nasai. Watashi-tachi wa arra ni dake tsukae, nanimono o mo kare ni resshinai. Mata watashi-tachi wa arra o sashioite,-gai no mono o shutoshite Takashi nai.' Sorede moshi, kare-ra ga somuki sarunaraba, itte yaru ga i. `Watashi-tachi wa musurimudearu koto o shogen suru
